Content:
Looked at an Aprilla 50cc today. It passed mot 2 days ago. But today when I went to purchase it wouldnt start. Turned out no fuel.

Fuelled up but wouldn't start after multiple attempts till battery exhausted. Tried with a jump start but no joy. Seller later checked plug - No spark at plug but power going to ht lead (he will change the plug tomorrow).

I didnt see the plug so don't know if fouled or overheated or snapped electrode.

Question is.... If it starts normally first time and passed an MOT 2 days ago (9k on clock, 2008). If. It just a crappy plug and poor battery. Battery was a cheepo not gel. What could have happened? And if a plug change makes it start and I reckon it should, what may be causing the plug to fail.

My thoughts are related to a cheepo battery, maybe overheating it even bad luck.

Asi can't strip the moped (because it's not mine yet) do you have any advice. Could it be caused by a catastrofic failure?

If oil is getting into combustion chamber, how could I tell and what could I do about it?

Cheers

Title: No spark at plug
Author: Jake8943
